title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide an acceptable evaluation of the scientists’ hypothesis. Acceptable evaluations include the following.

  • The scientists’ hypothesis is supported because the frequency of recombination is higher in mei-9-mut MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40BB@ flies (where the protein encoded by pch2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGWbGaam4yaiaadIgacaWGYaaaaa@3C7D@ is functional than it is in the mei-9-mut/pch2-mut MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FA8@ flies where it is not).

  • The scientists’ hypothesis is supported because the frequency of recombination is lower in the mei-9-mut/pch2-mut MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FA8@ flies (where the protein encoded by pch2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGWbGaam4yaiaadIgacaWGYaaaaa@3C7D@ is nonfunctional than it is in mei-9-mut MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40BB@ flies where it is functional).

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

  • The reduced incidence of crossing-over/frequency of recombination observed in mei-9-mut MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40BB@ flies could lead to (an increase in) nondisjunction/the formation of gametes with the incorrect numbers of chromosomes.

  • Gametes with incompatible chromosome numbers are less likely to result in viable/fertile offspring.

The response includes an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

  • The reduced incidence of crossing-over/frequency of recombination observed in mei-9-mut MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40BB@ flies could lead to (an increase in) nondisjunction/the formation of gametes with the incorrect numbers of chromosomes.

  • Gametes with incompatible chromosome numbers are less likely to result in viable/fertile offspring.
